title: Google\Cloud\Firestore\V1\Target\DocumentsTarget
name: DocumentsTarget
description:
A target specified by a set of documents names.

Generated from protobuf message google.firestore.v1.Target.DocumentsTarget

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.documents
params.description: The names of the documents to retrieve. In the format: projects/{project_id}/databases/{database_id}/documents/{document_path}. The request will fail if any of the document is not a child resource of the given database. Duplicate names will be elided.

methods.name: getDocuments
methods.description:
The names of the documents to retrieve. In the format: projects/{project_id}/databases/{database_id}/documents/{document_path}.

The request will fail if any of the document is not a child resource of the given database. Duplicate names will be elided.

Generated from protobuf field repeated string documents = 2;
